page.title: 14Holiday Makers
page.content: Sutton is a popular village for holiday makers with its sandy beaches and pleasant amusements.Most holiday makers,especially the older generation come for the peace and quiet and don't want Sutton to be changed while the younger ones would like Sutton to have more entertainment such as a swimming pool and more to do at night. most holiday makers come for 1to 2 weeks and are mainly from Leicester and Nottingham as these are dirty cities. So the fresh air and sandy beaches are a nice change.Many holiday makers stay at Breakwater Bungalows and other places such as Trusville caravan site, Sutton Springs and many stay with relations.Some only visit for 1 day as they are staying somewhere else.
